m_szDocTitle: China’s Didi Kuaidi to launch cross-city car-hailing service over Chinese New Year to aid world’s biggest human migration  | South China Morning Post
m_szDocSumamry: South China Morning Post Print Email Now Reading China’s Didi Kuaidi to launch cross-city car-hailing service over Chinese New Year to aid world’s biggest human migration   China’s Didi Kuaidi to launch cross-city car-hailing service over Chinese New Year to aid world’s biggest human migration PUBLISHED : Wednesday, 02 December, 2015, 8:00am UPDATED : Tuesday, 26 January, 2016, 3:51pm As electric car usage grows, what can Hong Kong do with all the old batteries? 1 Sep 2016 China’s top car-hailing app Didi Kuaidi and chief rival Uber revealed this week their respective plans to expand in China,
